entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle or rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 2. POP 30%
